description: This notification indicates that the FEC seconds threshold
has been reached/exceeded for the referred ATU-C.

event.Summary: FEC seconds ($v1) exceeded threshold ($v2) for ATU-C

description: Count of seconds during this interval that there was at least
one FEC correction event for one or more bearer channels in
this line. This parameter is inhibited during UAS or SES.
variables.name: HUAWEI-ADSL2-LINE-MIB::adsl2PMLCurr15MFecs

description: A threshold for the adsl2PMLCurr15MFecs counter
when adsl2PMLCurrUnit is ATUC{1}.
The value 0 means that no threshold is specified for the
associated counter.
variables.name: HUAWEI-ADSL2-LINE-MIB::adsl2LineAlarmConfProfileAtucThresh15MinFecs

description: This notification indicates that the FEC seconds threshold
has been reached/exceeded for the referred ATU-R.

event.Summary: FEC seconds ($v1) exceeded threshold ($v2) for ATU-R

description: Count of seconds during this interval that there was at least
one FEC correction event for one or more bearer channels in
this line. This parameter is inhibited during UAS or SES.
variables.name: HUAWEI-ADSL2-LINE-MIB::adsl2PMLCurr15MFecs

description: A threshold for the adsl2PMLCurr15MFecs counter
when adsl2PMLCurrUnit is ATUR {2}.
The value 0 means that no threshold is specified for the
associated counter.
variables.name: HUAWEI-ADSL2-LINE-MIB::adsl2LineAlarmConfProfileAturThresh15MinFecs

description: This notification indicates that the errored seconds threshold
has been reached/exceeded for the referred ATU-C.

event.Summary: Errored seconds ($v1) exceeded threshold ($v2) for ATU-C

description: Count of seconds during this interval that there was:
ATU-C: CRC-8 >= 1 for one or more bearer channels OR
LOS >= 1 OR SEF >=1 OR LPR >= 1
ATU-R: FEBE >= 1 for one or more bearer channels OR
LOS-FE >=1 OR RDI >=1 OR LPR-FE >=1 .
This parameter is inhibited during UAS.
variables.name: HUAWEI-ADSL2-LINE-MIB::adsl2PMLCurr15MEs

description: A threshold for the adsl2PMLCurr15MEs counter
when adsl2PMLCurrUnit is ATUC{1}.
The value 0 means that no threshold is specified for the
associated counter.
variables.name: HUAWEI-ADSL2-LINE-MIB::adsl2LineAlarmConfProfileAtucThresh15MinEs

description: This notification indicates that the errored seconds threshold
has been reached/exceeded for the referred ATU-R.

event.Summary: Errored seconds ($v1) exceeded threshold ($v2) for ATU-R

description: Count of seconds during this interval that there was:
ATU-C: CRC-8 >= 1 for one or more bearer channels OR
LOS >= 1 OR SEF >=1 OR LPR >= 1
ATU-R: FEBE >= 1 for one or more bearer channels OR
LOS-FE >=1 OR RDI >=1 OR LPR-FE >=1 .
This parameter is inhibited during UAS.
variables.name: HUAWEI-ADSL2-LINE-MIB::adsl2PMLCurr15MEs

description: A threshold for the adsl2PMLCurr15MEs counter
when adsl2PMLCurrUnit is ATUR {2}.
The value 0 means that no threshold is specified for the
associated counter.
variables.name: HUAWEI-ADSL2-LINE-MIB::adsl2LineAlarmConfProfileAturThresh15MinEs

description: This notification indicates that the severely-errored seconds
threshold has been reached/exceeded for the referred ATU-C.
Count of seconds during this interval that there was:
ATU-C: (CRC-8 summed over all bearer channels) >= 18 OR
LOS >= 1 OR SEF >= 1 OR LPR >= 1
ATU-R: (FEBE summed over all bearer channels) >= 18 OR
LOS-FE >= 1 OR RDI >= 1 OR LPR-FE >= 1 .
This parameter is inhibited during UAS.
variables.name: HUAWEI-ADSL2-LINE-MIB::adsl2PMLCurr15MSes

description: A threshold for the adsl2PMLCurr15MSes counter
when adsl2PMLCurrUnit is ATUC {1}.
The value 0 means that no threshold is specified for the
associated counter.
variables.name: HUAWEI-ADSL2-LINE-MIB::adsl2LineAlarmConfProfileAtucThresh15MinSes

description: This notification indicates that the severely-errored seconds
threshold has been reached/exceeded for the referred ATU-R.
Count of seconds during this interval that there was:
ATU-C: (CRC-8 summed over all bearer channels) >= 18 OR
LOS >= 1 OR SEF >= 1 OR LPR >= 1
ATU-R: (FEBE summed over all bearer channels) >= 18 OR
LOS-FE >= 1 OR RDI >= 1 OR LPR-FE >= 1 .
This parameter is inhibited during UAS.
variables.name: HUAWEI-ADSL2-LINE-MIB::adsl2PMLCurr15MSes

description: A threshold for the adsl2PMLCurr15MSes counter
when adsl2PMLCurrUnit is ATUR {2}.
The value 0 means that no threshold is specified for the
associated counter.
variables.name: HUAWEI-ADSL2-LINE-MIB::adsl2LineAlarmConfProfileAturThresh15MinSes

description: This notification indicates that the LOS seconds
threshold has been reached/exceeded for the referred ATU-C.

event.Summary: LOS seconds ($v1) exceeded threshold ($v2) for ATU-C

description: Count of seconds during this interval that there was LOS (or
LOS-FE for ATU-R).
variables.name: HUAWEI-ADSL2-LINE-MIB::adsl2PMLCurr15MLoss

description: A threshold for the adsl2PMLCurr15MLoss counter
when adsl2PMLCurrUnit is ATUC {1}.
The value 0 means that no threshold is specified for the
associated counter.
variables.name: HUAWEI-ADSL2-LINE-MIB::adsl2LineAlarmConfProfileAtucThresh15MinLoss

description: This notification indicates that the LOS seconds
threshold has been reached/exceeded for the referred ATU-R.

event.Summary: LOS seconds ($v1) exceeded threshold ($v2) for ATU-R

description: Count of seconds during this interval that there was LOS (or
LOS-FE for ATU-R).
variables.name: HUAWEI-ADSL2-LINE-MIB::adsl2PMLCurr15MLoss

description: A threshold for the adsl2PMLCurr15MLoss counter
when adsl2PMLCurrUnit is ATUR {2}.
The value 0 means that no threshold is specified for the
associated counter.
variables.name: HUAWEI-ADSL2-LINE-MIB::adsl2LineAlarmConfProfileAturThresh15MinLoss

description: This notification indicates that the unavailable seconds
threshold has been reached/exceeded for the referred ATU-C.

event.Summary: Unavailable seconds ($v1) exceeded threshold ($v2) for ATU-C

description: Count of seconds in Unavailability State during this
interval. Unavailability begins at the onset of 10
contiguous severely-errored seconds, and ends at the
onset of 10 contiguous seconds with no severely-errored
seconds.
variables.name: HUAWEI-ADSL2-LINE-MIB::adsl2PMLCurr15MUas

description: A threshold for the adsl2PMLCurr15MUas counter
when adsl2PMLCurrUnit is ATUC {1}.
The value 0 means that no threshold is specified for the
associated counter.
variables.name: HUAWEI-ADSL2-LINE-MIB::adsl2LineAlarmConfProfileAtucThresh15MinUas

description: This notification indicates that the unavailable seconds
threshold has been reached/exceeded for the referred ATU-R.

event.Summary: Unavailable seconds ($v1) exceeded threshold ($v2) for ATU-R

description: Count of seconds in Unavailability State during this
interval. Unavailability begins at the onset of 10
contiguous severely-errored seconds, and ends at the
onset of 10 contiguous seconds with no severely-errored
seconds.
variables.name: HUAWEI-ADSL2-LINE-MIB::adsl2PMLCurr15MUas

description: A threshold for the adsl2PMLCurr15MUas counter
when adsl2PMLCurrUnit is ATUR {2}.
The value 0 means that no threshold is specified for the
associated counter.
variables.name: HUAWEI-ADSL2-LINE-MIB::adsl2LineAlarmConfProfileAturThresh15MinUas

description: This notification indicates that the coding violations
threshold has been reached/exceeded for the referred ATU-C.

event.Summary: Coding violations ($v1) exceeded threshold ($v2) for ATU-C

description: Count of CRC-8 (FEBE for ATU-R) anomalies occurring in the
channel during the interval. This parameter is inhibited
during UAS or SES. If the CRC is applied over multiple
channels, then each related CRC-8 (or FEBE) anomaly should
increment each of the counters related to the individual
channels.
variables.name: HUAWEI-ADSL2-LINE-MIB::adsl2PMChCurr15MCodingViolations

description: A threshold for the adsl2PMChCurr15MCodingViolations
counter, when adsl2PMChCurrUnit is ATUC {1}.
The value 0 means that no threshold is specified for the
associated counter.
variables.name: HUAWEI-ADSL2-LINE-MIB::adsl2ChAlarmConfProfileAtucThresh15MinCodingViolations

description: This notification indicates that the coding violations
threshold has been reached/exceeded for the referred ATU-R.

event.Summary: Coding violations ($v1) exceeded threshold ($v2) for ATU-R

description: Count of CRC-8 (FEBE for ATU-R) anomalies occurring in the
channel during the interval. This parameter is inhibited
during UAS or SES. If the CRC is applied over multiple
channels, then each related CRC-8 (or FEBE) anomaly should
increment each of the counters related to the individual
channels.
variables.name: HUAWEI-ADSL2-LINE-MIB::adsl2PMChCurr15MCodingViolations

description: A threshold for the adsl2PMChCurr15MCodingViolations
counter, when adsl2PMChCurrUnit is ATUR {2}.
The value 0 means that no threshold is specified for the
associated counter.
variables.name: HUAWEI-ADSL2-LINE-MIB::adsl2ChAlarmConfProfileAturThresh15MinCodingViolations

description: This notification indicates that the corrected blocks
(FEC events) threshold has been reached/exceeded for the
referred ATU-C.

event.Summary: Corrected blocks ($v1) exceeded threshold ($v2) for ATU-C

description: Count of FEC (FFEC for ATU-R) anomalies (corrected code words)
occurring in the channel during the interval. This parameter
is inhibited during UAS or SES. If the FEC is applied over
multiple channels, then each related FEC (or FFEC) anomaly
should increment each of the counters related to the
individual channels.
variables.name: HUAWEI-ADSL2-LINE-MIB::adsl2PMChCurr15MCorrectedBlocks

description: A threshold for the adsl2PMChCurr15MCorrectedBlocks
counter, when adsl2PMChCurrUnit is ATUC {1}.
The value 0 means that no threshold is specified for the
associated counter.
variables.name: HUAWEI-ADSL2-LINE-MIB::adsl2ChAlarmConfProfileAtucThresh15MinCorrected

description: This notification indicates that the corrected blocks
(FEC events) threshold has been reached/exceeded for the
referred ATU-R.

event.Summary: Corrected blocks ($v1) exceeded threshold ($v2) for ATU-C

description: Count of FEC (FFEC for ATU-R) anomalies (corrected code words)
occurring in the channel during the interval. This parameter
is inhibited during UAS or SES. If the FEC is applied over
multiple channels, then each related FEC (or FFEC) anomaly
should increment each of the counters related to the
individual channels.
variables.name: HUAWEI-ADSL2-LINE-MIB::adsl2PMChCurr15MCorrectedBlocks

description: A threshold for the adsl2PMChCurr15MCorrectedBlocks
counter, when adsl2PMChCurrUnit is ATUR {2}.
The value 0 means that no threshold is specified for the
associated counter.
variables.name: HUAWEI-ADSL2-LINE-MIB::adsl2ChAlarmConfProfileAturThresh15MinCorrected

description: This notification indicates that the failed full
initializations threshold has been reached/exceeded for the
referred ADSL/ADSL2 or ADSL2 line.

event.Summary: Failed initializations ($v1) exceeded threshold ($v2) on ADSL line

description: Count of failed full initializations on the line during this
interval.
variables.name: HUAWEI-ADSL2-LINE-MIB::adsl2PMLCurrInit15MFailedFullInits

description: A threshold for the adsl2PMLCurrInit15MfailedFullInits
counter.
The value 0 means that no threshold is specified for the
associated counter.
variables.name: HUAWEI-ADSL2-LINE-MIB::adsl2LineAlarmConfProfileThresh15MinFailedFullInt

description: This notification indicates that the failed short
initializations threshold has been reached/exceeded for the
referred ADSL/ADSL2 or ADSL2 line.

event.Summary: Failed short initializations ($v1) exceeded threshold ($v2) for ADSL line

description: Count of failed short initializations on the line during this
interval.
variables.name: HUAWEI-ADSL2-LINE-MIB::adsl2PMLCurrInit15MFailedShortInits

description: A threshold for the adsl2PMLCurrInit15MFailedShortInits
counter.
The value 0 means that no threshold is specified for the
associated counter.
variables.name: HUAWEI-ADSL2-LINE-MIB::adsl2LineAlarmConfProfileThresh15MinFailedShrtInt

description: This notification indicates that a status change is
detected for the referred ATU-C.
Indicates current state (existing failures) of the ATU-C.
This is a bit-map of possible conditions.
variables.name: HUAWEI-ADSL2-LINE-MIB::adsl2LineStatusAtuc

description: This notification indicates that a status change is
detected for the referred ATU-R.
Indicates current state (existing failures) of the ATU-R.
This is a bit-map of possible conditions.
variables.name: HUAWEI-ADSL2-LINE-MIB::adsl2LineStatusAtur
